item.title: Cesarean Doulas
item.description: I get this a lot, “Oh, doulas are just for natural, home births, right?” WRONG! Here’s a great article in support of doulas for cesarean births! https://www.dona.org/five-reasons-you-may-want-a-birth-doula-during-your-cesarean-birth/
